Description:
Roles and Responsibilties:To supervise the maintenance of plants, equipment, components or systems, to ensure the work is executed to the client's specifications.
To plan and schedule the work and efficiently organise the site in order to meet an agreed programme of deadlines.
To oversee quality control and safety matters on the site, and ensure that regulations are adhered to.
To resolve any unexpected technical difficulties and other problems that may arise at any time.
To attend regular meetings with clients, architects and consultants and keeping them informed of progress.Skills
Skills:
Good experience in GE gas turbines Frame 9 FA.
Good experience in GE steam turbines D11.
Good experience in GE control system MARK Vie.
Good experience in PLC such as Siemens S7, Allen Bradley, Bentley Nevada systems.
Good experience in BOP such as Heat Recovery Steam Generator HRSG, Fuel Gas Compressors, DEMIN, Air compressors,â€¦.etc.
